ygData.subject: Re: Blued hammer,
ygData.msgSnippet: A Druid on the Mithaniel Marr server whose level is 35 =) I have talked to ya before about helping me out but you didn t want to.. don t know if you remember
ygData.messageBody:
A Druid on the Mithaniel Marr server whose level is 35 =) I have talked to ya
before about helping me out but you didn't want to.. don't know if you remember
me but anyways, thanks for answering my questions

Trilin
